#include <stdio.h>
int arr[10001][101];
int main(void) {
	int n,q,x,y,t,i,j,count,t1,ans;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&q);
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&t);
		count=0;
		for(j=1;j<=100;j++)
		{
			arr[i][j]=arr[i-1][j];
		}
		arr[i][t]++;
	}
	while(q--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
		ans=0;
		for(i=1;i<=100;i++)
		{
			t1=arr[y][i]-arr[x-1][i];
			if(t1)
			ans++;
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
